body:
I know there are a lot of discussions about texture packs already but I thought I would create for my specific needs. I'll just write a list of requirements and then if anyone has a pack that fits my list please post it below or email me it at a.talbotrice@hotmail.com. 

- PvP optimised 
- 16x16 size (My laptop is so bad and it's optimal fps is 20 so I can't afford anything that will slow it down!)
- Simple and clean design 
- 1.7.9 compatible 

Thanks so much in advance!

title: 16x16 PvP Optimised Texture Pack?
